content: GX 3 Gas-actuated fastening tool Gas nailer with single power source for drywall track, electrical, mechanical and building construction applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Single source of energy, no batteries to recharge are needed Curved, 40-nail magazine for better accessibility in narrow spaces and deep tracks High fastening rate for high productivity and maximum efficiency Wide range of nails for fastening to a wide variety of materials Gas gauge helps to avoid running out of gas unexpectedly Applications Fastening drywall track to floors, walls and ceilings on concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening mesh, membranes or foil with special washer holders to concrete walls Fastening wall tie connections to concrete, solid masonry or steel – use of the special washer holder is recommended Suitable for various light-duty fastening applications on concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening cables, conduits or various light electrical installations – use of the ME nailer nose is recommended ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimension (L x W): 436 x 132 mm Tool body weight: 8.8 lb. Fastener Intake: Collated Technical Data | Dimension (L x W) | 436 x 132 mm | Tool body weight | 8.8 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.55 - 1.54 in | Power source type | GC 40 Gas can, GC 41 Gas can, GC 42 Gas can | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 100 J ### ITEMS- 3538143 -
